itunes:title: Fake News 54 -  U Mad, Mad Dog?
title: Fake News 54 -  U Mad, Mad Dog?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with James Mattis expressing his discontent with Trump using the military to suppress the protests, LEGO moves towards removing first responder themed LEGO sets f...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with James Mattis expressing his discontent with Trump using the military to suppress the protests, LEGO moves towards removing first responder themed LEGO sets from store shelves, the officer who killed George Floyd has had his charge upgraded, a Massachusetts man who threw a pickle at a Vermont highway worker is charged with simple assault, Asheville Police destroy a medic station setup near a protest site, and the New York chapter of Black Lives Matter has created their own police force.

description:
